text: The other Kohathites obtained ten cities by lot for their clans from the tribe of Ephraim, from the tribe of Dan, and from the half-tribe of Manasseh.
He ran under the elephant, stabbed it and killed it. The beast fell to the ground on top of him, and he died there.
Even those who produce them are not long-lived;
And when he had taken leave of them, he went off to the mountain to pray.
The Two Foundations. “Why do you call me, ‘Lord, Lord,' but not do what I command?
Not that anyone has seen the Father except the one who is from God; he has seen the Father.
